TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UploadStringCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別的執行個體傳遞至。Instances of this class are passed to the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以非同步方式上載字串。The following code example demonstrates asynchronously uploading a string. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#38)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#38)] 上傳完成時，會呼叫下列方法。The following method is called when the upload completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#39)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#39)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Result As String
public: property System::String ^ Result { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得伺服器對字串上傳作業 (呼叫 方法所啟動) 的回應。

span.span: Gets the server reply to a string upload operation that is started by calling an method.
A array that contains the server reply.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該檢查和屬性，來判斷是否已完成上傳。You should check the and properties to determine whether the upload completed. 如果屬性的值是物件或屬性的值是`true`，非同步作業未正確完成和屬性的值將不再有效。If the property's value is an object or the property's value is `true`, the asynchronous operation did not complete correctly and the property's value will not be valid. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#39)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#39)]
